there is an older driver for that card.. a 96.x.x.x something.. hang on.

he might need to install nvidia-glx-legacy and then look in the hardware section of System/Admin again.. other than that, there is a driver on nvidia's site for that card that can be installed.. however with every kernel upgrade he'll need to reinstall it.
or he can use the generic nv driver but it won't give him the special effects
